subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester City is on the verge of qualifying automatically for the Champions League after beating Stoke, 3-0, three days after defeating Stoke in the F.A. Cup final to end a 35-year title drought.
snippet: Manchester City is on the verge of qualifying automatically for the Champions League after beating Stoke, 3-0, three days after defeating Stoke in the F.A. Cup final to end a 35-year title drought.
